Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT

Title: Relates to authorizing and permitting appearance enhancement licensees to apply dye to eyelash and eyebrow hair
Summary: Establishes Sabria's law to authorize and permit appearance enhancement licensees to apply dye to eyelash and eyebrow hair.
LawCode: Add ยง404-d, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to authorizing and permitting appearance enhancement licensees to apply dye to eyelash and eyebrow hair
